Welcome to Terradue DSITools!!

Terradue DSITools is a set of command line tools to interact with DSI REST APIs for enabling the creation of public clouds.

Download

See the download page to download the package you need.

Installation

DSITools is a Java tool, so you must have Java installed in order to proceed. Users need at least the Java Runtime Environment (JRE), the Java Development Kit (JDK) is a plus.

See installation instructions how to proper install the tools.
